summary.description:
Today, more moisture-laden rainfall (up 4.1 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 275 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1856 m), feels like temperature (up 2.6°C), outside temperature (up 2.8°C), and inside temperature (up 2.3°C) when compared to today.

summary.summary: Inside; comfortable and pleasant temperatures. Outside; mild temperatures are expected. Also, pleasant humidity levels and little or no wind. Moderate rainfall, occasional overcast conditions, and the light is absent. The weather may change rapidly and become worse.
